message: Hello Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product which is tailored to meet your specific needs. This product comes with exceptional features designed to enhance your experience. I believe its value exceeds $12000 to you, given your requirements. To start our negotiation, I am offering it to you at $15000.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of your product, but I am looking to keep my investment within a certain budget. Would it be possible to negotiate the price down to $12000?
